title: Store and Web Order
description: The order placed via a store or web portal.

xdm:orderID.title: Order ID
xdm:orderID.description: Unique identifier assigned by the seller for this order. There is no guarantee that the ID is unique.

xdm:orderDate.title: Order Date
xdm:orderDate.description: The date and time when the order was placed.

xdm:priceTotal.title: Price Total
xdm:priceTotal.description: The total price of this order after all discounts and taxes have been applied.

xdm:transactionID.title: Transaction ID
xdm:transactionID.description: Unique identifier assigned by the payment system.

xdm:paymentAmount.title: Payment Amount
xdm:paymentAmount.description: Unique identifier assigned by the payment system.

xdm:currencyCode.title: Currency
xdm:currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 currency code used for the order totals.
